subject: Appointments and Executive Changes
Football
Labor
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: The winner of Sunday’s election to be the next executive director of the N.F.L.P.A. will be in fighting shape for the coming contract negotiations with team owners.
snippet: The winner of Sunday’s election to be the next executive director of the N.F.L.P.A. will be in fighting shape for the coming contract negotiations with team owners.
